content.text: is designed to process original billing records for accounts associated with the New York Power Authority (NYPA). It involves multiple steps to insert and update billing records, ensuring that the billing data is correctly processed for the current billing period. The procedure handles the insertion of original bills and their details, updates billing records, and manages error handling and transaction control.
The complexity of this stored procedure is high due to the following reasons:
It involves multiple steps and operations, including data insertion, updates, and complex conditional logic.
It manages transactions and error handling, which adds to the complexity.
The procedure interacts with multiple tables and requires careful synchronization of data across these tables.
It includes detailed business logic for handling billing periods, adjustments, and account statuses.
: This parameter represents the ID of the user who is authenticated to execute this procedure. It is used for auditing purposes to track who made changes to the billing records.
: This is an output parameter that shows the execution status of the procedure. It returns
: The procedure begins by declaring and initializing various local variables used throughout the process.
: It checks if there are any original bills for the current billing period that have not yet been processed.
: The procedure uses a TRY-CATCH block to manage transactions, ensuring that all operations are atomic and can be rolled back in case of errors.
: It retrieves billing parameters such as
Ensures that the billing period and revised billing period are correctly handled.
with the adjusted account electric sequence ID.
to mark records as processed and link them to the corresponding billing records.
: If any errors occur during the process, the transaction is rolled back, and an error message is logged.
checks, which can be resource-intensive if the underlying queries are not optimized.
: The use of multiple joins across large tables can lead to performance bottlenecks if indexes are not properly utilized.
: The transaction scope is large, which can lead to locking and blocking issues in a high-concurrency environment.
: The extensive use of conditional logic and case statements can impact performance, especially if the conditions are complex.
: If the transaction fails and is not properly rolled back, it could lead to data inconsistencies.
: The procedure may face concurrency issues due to the large transaction scope, potentially leading to deadlocks.
: While the procedure includes error handling, the complexity of the logic may result in unhandled exceptions if not thoroughly tested.
: As the volume of data grows, the performance of the procedure may degrade if not optimized for larger datasets.
) can reduce flexibility and require changes in the code for different environments or configurations.

--**************************************************************************************
--* Name:         
--* Description:  Process the NYPA account billing original bills.  The sequential processing steps needed to
--     Step 01)      Insert the new Cover sheet billing types
--     Step 02)      Get the original bills minimum Delivery From Date and  the maximum Delivery To Date for the billing period.
--     Step 03)      Insert the new Cover sheet billing items
--     Step 04)      Get the total amount to be vouchered and the seqid of the row off of the coversheet
--     Step 05)      Get the original bills minimum Delivery From Date and  the maximum Delivery To Date for the billing period.
--     Step 06)      Get the  InvoiceTracking sequence id after it is inserted
--     Step 07)      Insert the orginal bills where the UploadNYPAAccountBilling.BillingPeriod is equal to the UploadNYPAAccountBilling.RevisedBillingPeriod
--     Step 08)      Insert the orginal bills detail where the UploadNYPAAccountBilling.BillingPeriod is equal to the UploadNYPAAccountBilling.RevisedBillingPeriod
--     Step 09)      Set the PostMarkDate, DatePaymentDue and DateAcceptanceIntoOEC in each of the  AccountBillingElectric (Detail table)
--     Step 10)      Encore monthly Billing, the amortization schedule for the billing period
--
-- Update the Account billing records with the correct account statuses of the existing accounts and the
-- current cycle exchange actions.  The exchange code will be set to null.
-- 
-- Determine the active accounts that the utility company did not send a bill for the cycle and add them to the 
-- to the "UploadNYPAAccountBilling" table.  At this point, we should have a collection of all of the accounts 
-- that were billed and all of the accounts that should have been billed.
--*               
--* Exec:        usp_ProcessABOriginalBillsNYPA
--*
--* Parameter(s):         
--*                            BillingPeriod varchar(6)       - Current billing period
--*                            PostMarkDate varchar(8), 
--*                            DatePaymentDue varchar(8), 
--*                            DateAcceptanceIntoOEC varchar(8),
--*                            DateOECApproved varchar(8),
--*                            StatusCode  int output       -  Execution Return Status 
--*
--* Return:	    0 Success
--*                   9 Failure
--*
-- Notes
-- CurrentAccountBillingInvoiceContractBudgetLine= AgencyDivision.AgencyMeteredInvoiceContractBudgetLine is a future
-- enhancement for invoicing (10/2/2007)
--
--* AUTHOR:       Peter Heller (PAH)
--* Created On:   10/26/2005
--**************************************************************************************
--* Date         Tech Description of Change
--* ---------- ----  -------------------------------------------------------------
--* 10/26/2005 PAH  First Version  
--* 08/26/2011 PAH  Equated TotalAmountDue to ManualPaymentOverrideAmount
--* 03/26/2015 PAH  Added Standby columns to AccountBillingElectric
--* 8/23/2018	ZD	Added Netmetering colums 
--* 2/6/2019  ZD-VY	integrated unique account seqid
--***************************************************************************************
CREATE Procedure [Nypa].[usp_ProcessAccountBillingOriginals]
(
	@AuthenticatedUserID AS INT,
	@StatusCode AS INT  OUTPUT
)
AS
BEGIN
	declare @RC int
	declare @InvoiceTrackingSeqid int
	declare @InvoiceUtilityCompanyCoverSheetSeqid int
	declare @UtililtyCompanyCycleParametersExist int
	declare @BillingCycle varchar(1)
	declare @ExhangeCodeNull varchar(2)
	declare @FromDateParm varchar(1) 
	declare @ToDateParm varchar(1) 
	declare @Yes varchar(1) 
	declare @VoucherAmount money
	declare @PostMarkDate varchar(8)
	declare @DatePaymentDue varchar(8)
	declare @DateAcceptanceIntoOEC varchar(8)
	declare @BillCreationDate varchar(8)
	declare @BillingPeriod varchar(6)
	declare @IsCurrentBillingPeriod  int
	declare @HasCurrentBillingPeriodBeenProcessed  int
	declare @BillingPeriodMismatch  int
	declare @StopCurrentBillingPeriodProcess  int
	declare @NumberOfOriginalBills  int
	declare @NumberOfOriginalBillsProcessed  int
	declare @UtilityCompanySeqid int
	declare @InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid int
	declare @AccountBilling int
	declare @AccountBillingElectric int
	declare @AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric int
	declare @AccountBillingElectricUpdate INT
    
	SET @InvoiceTrackingSeqid = null
	set @BillingCycle = 'M'
	set @FromDateParm = 'F'
	set @ToDateParm = 'T'
	set @Yes = 'Y'
	--
	set @BillingPeriodMismatch = 0
	set @StopCurrentBillingPeriodProcess = 0
	set @UtilityCompanySeqid = 7
	set @InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid = 1

	declare @errCurrentAccountNumber nvarchar(15)
	declare @errOriginalAccountNumber nvarchar(15)
	declare @errCurrentMeterNumber nvarchar(12)
	declare @errOriginalMeterNumber nvarchar(12)
	declare @ExchangeErrorMessage nvarchar(4000);
	declare @ErrorMessage nvarchar(4000);
	declare @ErrorSeverity int;
	declare @ErrorState int;
	declare @ErrorNumber int;
	declare @ErrorLine int;
	declare @ErrorProcedure nvarchar(126);
	declare @CommitTransaction varchar(1)  
	
	--	Check Whether it is the current billing and that it has not been already processed
	SELECT  @NumberOfOriginalBills = count(*)
	FROM 
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric inner join
			Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame on Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod and 
			Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
	group by 
			Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod
	HAVING 
			(Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')
	
	select	@NumberOfOriginalBillsProcessed  = count(*)
	FROM     
			Billing.AccountBilling inner join
			Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame on Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod and 
			Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
	WHERE  
			(Billing.AccountBilling.UtilityCompanySeqid = 7) and 
			(Billing.AccountBilling.CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup = 1) and 
			(Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')

	IF (@NumberOfOriginalBills > 0 AND @NumberOfOriginalBillsProcessed = 0)
	BEGIN
		-- Insert the orginal bills detail where the UploadNYPAAccountBilling.BillingPeriod is equal to the UploadNYPAAccountBilling.RevisedBillingPeriod
		-- Set the PostMarkDate, DatePaymentDue and DateAcceptanceIntoOEC in each of the  AccountBillingElectric (Detail table)
		-- Check if the parameters exist
		BEGIN TRY
			-- begin transaction ProcessAccountBillingOriginals;
			SET @CommitTransaction = 'Y'
			SELECT 
				@BillCreationDate = BillCreationDate,  @PostMarkDate = PostMarkDate, @DatePaymentDue = DatePaymentDue,@DateAcceptanceIntoOEC = DateAcceptanceIntoOEC
			FROM
				Common.UploadCycleParameters inner join
				Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame on Common.UploadCycleParameters.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
			WHERE
				(Common.UploadCycleParameters.UtilityCompanySeqid = @UtilityCompanySeqid) and 
				(Common.UploadCycleParameters.InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid = @InvoiceAccountGroupSeqid) and 
				(Common.UploadCycleParameters.CanProcessData = @Yes) and 
				(Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')
				
			if (@@ROWCOUNT = 0)
			BEGIN
				--  If the parameters do not exist, assume that the bill was processed mid month.
				-- This should only occur in revisions to accounts prior to the legacy conversion 
				-- period
				SELECT @BillingPeriod = BillingPeriod from Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame where (CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')
				set @BillCreationDate = @BillingPeriod +'05'
				set @PostMarkDate = @BillingPeriod+'15'
				set @DatePaymentDue = @BillingPeriod+'15'
				set @DateAcceptanceIntoOEC = @BillingPeriod+'15'
			END;

			-- Insert the orginal and back bills where the UploadNYPAAccountBilling.RevisedBillingPeriod is used for all inserts.
			-- The inclusion of the back bills forces the use of the RevisedBillingPeriod for the BillingPeriod.  
			insert into Billing.AccountBilling
				(UploadFileSeqid,OriginalAccountNumber,AccountSeqid, InvoiceTrackingSeqid, PreviousBillingPeriod, BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, NextBillingPeriod, CurrentInvoiceAccountBillingGroup,  
				ManualDataEntry, ManualPaymentOverride, AccountBillingStatus, PreviousAccountBillingStatus, AccountBillingStatusCodePeriod, 
				ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod, BillingCycle, SalesType, AccountEnergyUsage, AccountDemandUsage,OriginalEnergyUsage,OriginalDemandUsage,
				EnergySource, ProductionAndDeliveryTariff, 
				BillingPeriodDays, FromDate, ToDate, BillingAction, OriginalBilledAmount, ManualPaymentOverrideAmount, RevisedBilledAmount, TotalAmountDue, 
				OriginalBilledAmountPaid, PaidAdjustmentAmount, SplitFiscalYear, ChargeToFiscalYear, ChargeToPriorFiscalYear,CurrentAccountBillingInvoiceContractBudgetLine, UtilityCompanySeqid,AuthenticatedUserID, 
				InitialPostingDate, DateAdded, LastUpdate,LastPeriodModified,IsTimeOfDayAccount,NetDollarChange,NetEnergyUsageChange,NetDemandUsageChange,
				AccountReactivePowerEnergy ,OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy ,NetChangeAccountReactivePowerEnergy
				,UniqueAccountSeqId) -- added on 2/6/2019
			SELECT Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.UploadFileSeqid, -- Billing.AccountBilling.UploadFileSeqid
				Billing.Account.OriginalAccountNumber,
				Billing.Account.AccountSeqid, 
				null, --@InvoiceTrackingSeqid,     -- Insert  the  InvoiceTracking sequence id 
				[dbo].[CreatePreviousPeriodForExchanges] (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod,Billing.Account.BillingCycle,Billing.Account.AccountStatus) , -- 	Billing.AccountBilling.PreviousBillingPeriod
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision, --Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision, 
				[dbo].[CreateNextPeriodForExchanges] (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod,Billing.Account.BillingCycle,Billing.Account.AccountStatus) , -- Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.NextBillingPeriod
				Billing.Account.CurrentInvoiceAccountGroup, 
				'N', -- Add to Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric        Billing.AccountBilling.ManualDataEntry,
				'N', --  Add to Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric       Billing.AccountBilling.ManualPaymentOverride, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountStatus, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountPreviousStatus, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountStatusCodePeriod, 
				'Y', -- Always yes if it is added at this point !     Billing.AccountBilling.ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod, 
				Billing.Account.BillingCycle, Billing.Account.SalesType, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountEnergyUsage, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountDemandUsage, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountEnergyUsage, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountDemandUsage, 
				Billing.Account.EnergySource, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProductionAndDeliveryTariff, 
				dbo.CalculateNumberOfBillingDays(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.FromDate,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ToDate),	--Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodDays, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.FromDate, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ToDate, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingAction,
				case when Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod=Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision 
							then	Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.OriginalReactivePowerDollars +
									Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityAllocationCharge + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryAllocationCharge
							else 0 
				end,-- OriginalBilledAmount  Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount, 
				case when Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod=Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision 
				then Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.OriginalReactivePowerDollars+
									Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityAllocationCharge + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryAllocationCharge 
				else 0 end,	 --  Manually overridden  Billing.AccountBilling.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.OriginalReactivePowerDollars+
									Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityAllocationCharge + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryAllocationCharge,
				case when Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod=Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision 
							then	Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.OriginalReactivePowerDollars +
									Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityAllocationCharge + Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryAllocationCharge
							else 0 
				end,	-- TotalAmountDue  Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount, 
						-- Billing.AccountBilling.TotalAmountDue will be adjusted if there are non-zero net paid adjustments in Nypa.usp_ProcessAccountBillingRebills.
						-- The total amount due is for the current billing period only.  Back billed accounts with must have an original amount of $0.00.
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount, 
				0.00, -- Billing.AccountBilling.PaidAdjustmentAmount, 
				[dbo].[IsFiscalYearSplit] (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ToDate),
				[dbo].[CalculateFiscalYearIfSplit] (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ToDate,@ToDateParm),
				[dbo].[CalculateFiscalYearIfSplit] (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.FromDate, Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ToDate,@FromDateParm),
				null, --CurrentAccountBillingInvoiceContractBudgetLine, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid,
				@AuthenticatedUserID,  -- Billing.AccountBilling.AuthenticatedUserID
				@BillCreationDate, --Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillCreationDate, 
				getdate(), getdate(),
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.IsTimeOfDayAccount,
				/*
				--	All original period net changes will be zero  PAH
				*/
				0.00,  --Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalNetAdjustedAmount+isnull(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount,0), --NetDollarChange
				0,     --Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountEnergyUsage+Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelAccountEnergyUsage, --NetEnergyUsageChange 
				0.0,    --Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountDemandUsage+Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelAccountDemandUsage -- NetDemandUsageChange
				AccountReactivePowerEnergy ,OriginalAccountReactivePowerEnergy ,NetChangeAccountReactivePowerEnergy
				, Account.UniqueAccountSeqid -- added on 2/6/2019
			FROM 
				Billing.Account INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric 
				ON (Billing.Account.UniqueAccountSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.UniqueAccountSeqId AND IsCurrentRecord = 'Y')
				AND Billing.Account.UtilityAccountProvider = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid 
				INNER JOIN
				Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame on Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
			WHERE 
				(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid = 7) and 
				(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AdjustedAccountBill is null) and 
				(Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')
			
			SELECT @AccountBilling = @@rowcount
			print 'Number of Account billing inserts: ' + cast(@AccountBilling as varchar(10))
			-- Insert the orginal and back bills where the UploadNYPAAccountBilling.RevisedBillingPeriod is used for all inserts.
			-- The inclusion of the back bills forces the use of the RevisedBillingPeriod for the BillingPeriod.  
			insert  into Billing.AccountBillingElectric
				(AdjustedAccountElectric ,
				OriginalAccountNumber ,
				MonthlyAccountBillingChargesElectric ,
				AccountBillingRowState ,
				BillingPeriod ,
				BillingPeriodRevision ,
				DeliveryTariffRate ,
				DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate ,
				CommodityTariffRate ,
				CommodityTariffEffectiveDate ,
				LoadFactor ,
				BillCreationDate ,
				PostMarkDate ,
				DatePaymentDue ,
				DateAcceptanceIntoOEC ,
				PreviousAccountBalance ,
				FuelAdjustmentAmount ,
				LatePaymentAmount ,
				ArrearAmount ,
				CreditedPaidAmount ,
				CreditedPaymentDate ,
				DiscountPercentage ,
				DDDSurchargeAmount ,
				DDDSurchargePercentage ,
				DeliveryConsumption ,
				DeliveryConsumptionOffPeak ,
				DeliveryConsumptionShoulder ,
				DeliveryDemand ,
				DeliveryDemandOffPeak ,
				DeliveryDemandShoulder ,
				DeliveryStreetLightingFacilityPoints ,
				CommodityConsumption ,
				CommodityConsumptionOffPeak ,
				CommodityConsumptionShoulder ,
				CommodityDemand ,
				CommodityDemandOffPeak ,
				CommodityDemandShoulder ,
				CommodityFacilityPoints ,
				GrossReceiptTax ,
				GRTRate ,
				EnergyCostAdjustment ,
				EnergyCostAdjustmentPercentage ,
				AccountEnergyUsage ,
				AccountDemandUsage ,
				InitialPostingDate ,
				Notes ,
				AuthenticatedUserID ,
				DateAdded ,
				LastUpdate ,
				UtilityCompanySeqid ,
				LastPeriodModified ,
				IsTimeOfDayAccount ,
				IsMinimumBilledCharged ,
				MinimumBilledEnergyDollars ,
				MinimumBilledDemandDollars ,
				MaxBilledDemandPeriod ,
				MaxBilledDemandUsage ,
				IsSpannedPeriodBill ,
				DeliveryFacilityPointsAmount ,
				CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount ,
				BilledAmount ,
				OriginalReactivePowerDollars ,
				RevisedReactivePowerDollars ,
				NetchangeReactivePowerDollars ,
				CommodityAllocationCharge ,
				DeliveryAllocationCharge ,
				MinimumBilledDemandUsage ,
				IsDeliveryMinimumBilledFlag ,
				DeliveryMinimumBilledAmount ,
				DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand ,
				ProductionMisc1 ,
				ProductionMisc2 ,
				DeliveryMisc1 ,
				DeliveryMisc2 ,
				MinimumBilledEnergyUsage ,
				DeliveryMaximumBilledDemand ,
				DeliveryMaximumBilledDemandPeriod,
				ContractNumber,
				StandbyContractDemand,
				StandbyContractDemandCharges,
				StandbyAsUsedDailyDemand,
				StandbyAsUsedDailyDemandCharges
				,CreditCurrentPeriod
				,CancelCreditCurrentPeriod
				,CreditPrecedingPeriod
				,CancelCreditPrecedingPeriod
				,CreditToApplySatellites
				,CancelCreditToApplySatellites
				,CreditFromHost
				,CancelCreditFromHost
				,CreditsToCarryForward
				,CancelCreditsToCarryForward
				,CurrentPeriodOffPeakCredit
				,CancelCurrentPeriodOffPeakCredit
				,CurrentPeriodOnPeakCredit
				,CancelCurrentPeriodOnPeakCredit
				,NetMeteredAccountFlag
				,CancelNetMeteredAccountFlag
				,HostNetMeteredAccountNumber
				,CancelHostNetMeteredAccountNumber
				,PEXCESS
				,CancelPEXCESS
				, UniqueAccountSeqId) -- added on 2/6/2019
			SELECT distinct
				null , --AccountBillingElectric.AdjustedAccountElectric, 
				Billing.Account.OriginalAccountNumber ,
				Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid ,
				1 , --AccountBillingElectric.AccountBillingRowState, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision , --Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision ,
				Billing.Account.DeliveryTariffRate ,
				Billing.Account.DeliveryTariffEffectiveDate ,
				Billing.Account.CommodityTariffRate ,
				Billing.Account.CommodityTariffEffectiveDate ,
				dbo.CalculateLoadFactor(Billing.AccountBilling.AccountEnergyUsage,
										Billing.AccountBilling.AccountDemandUsage,
										Billing.AccountBilling.FromDate,
										Billing.AccountBilling.ToDate) ,  -- AccountBillingElectric.LoadFactor,  
				@BillCreationDate , -- Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric. BillCreationDate, 
				@PostMarkDate , --AccountBillingElectric.PostMarkDate
				@DatePaymentDue , -- AccountBillingElectric.DatePaymentDue, 
				@DateAcceptanceIntoOEC , -- AccountBillingElectric.DateAcceptanceIntoOEC, 
				0.00 , --AccountBillingElectric.PreviousAccountBalance, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.FuelAdjustmentAmount ,
				0.00 , --AccountBillingElectric.LatePaymentAmount, 
				0.00 , --AccountBillingElectric.ArrearAmount, 
				0.00 , --AccountBillingElectric.CreditedPaidAmount,   -- Updated later from the invoice file
				0.00 , --AccountBillingElectric.CreditedPaymentDate,   -- Updated later from the invoice file
				0 , --  AccountBillingElectric.DiscountPercentage, 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DDDSurchargeAmount ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DDDSurchargePercentage ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryConsumption ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryConsumptionOffPeak ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryConsumptionShoulder ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryDemand ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryDemandOffPeak ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryDemandShoulder ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryStreetLightingFacilityPoints ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityConsumption ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityConsumptionOffPeak ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityConsumptionShoulder ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityDemand ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityDemandOffPeak ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityDemandShoulder ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityFacilityPoints ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.GrossReceiptTax ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.GRTRate ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.EnergyCostAdjustment ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.EnergyCostAdjustmentPercentage ,
				Billing.AccountBilling.AccountEnergyUsage ,
				Billing.AccountBilling.AccountDemandUsage ,
				Billing.AccountBilling.InitialPostingDate ,
				null , --AccountBillingElectric.Notes, 
				Billing.AccountBilling.AuthenticatedUserID ,
				Billing.AccountBilling.DateAdded ,
				getdate() , --Billing.AccountBilling.LastUpdate
				@UtilityCompanySeqid ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.IsTimeOfDayAccount ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.IsMinimumBilledCharged ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MinimumBilledEnergyDollars ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MinimumBilledDemandDollars ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MaxBilledDemandPeriod ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MaxBilledDemandUsage ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.IsSpannedPeriodBill ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryFacilityPointsAmount ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CustomerLevelAdjustmentAmount ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.TotalReBilledAmount ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.OriginalReactivePowerDollars ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.RevisedReactivePowerDollars ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.NetchangeReactivePowerDollars ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CommodityAllocationCharge ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryAllocationCharge ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MinimumBilledDemandUsage ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.IsDeliveryMinimumBilledFlag ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMinimumBilledAmount ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMinimumBilledDemand ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProductionMisc1 ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ProductionMisc2 ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMisc1 ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMisc2 ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.MinimumBilledEnergyUsage ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMaximumBilledDemand ,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.DeliveryMaximumBilledDemandPeriod,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.ContractNumber,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.StandbyContractDemand,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.StandbyContractDemandCharges,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.StandbyAsUsedDailyDemand,
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.StandbyAsUsedDailyDemandCharges
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditCurrentPeriod
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditCurrentPeriod
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditPrecedingPeriod
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditPrecedingPeriod
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditToApplySatellites
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditToApplySatellites
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditFromHost
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditFromHost
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CreditsToCarryForward
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCreditsToCarryForward
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CurrentPeriodOffPeakCredit
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCurrentPeriodOffPeakCredit
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CurrentPeriodOnPeakCredit
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelCurrentPeriodOnPeakCredit
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.NetMeteredAccountFlag
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelNetMeteredAccountFlag
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.HostNetMeteredAccountNumber
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelHostNetMeteredAccountNumber
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.PEXCESS
				,Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.CancelPEXCESS
				, Account.UniqueAccountSeqid
			from Billing.Account
				inner join Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric 
				ON (Billing.Account.UniqueAccountSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.UniqueAccountSeqId AND IsCurrentRecord = 'Y')
				and Billing.Account.UtilityAccountProvider = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid
				inner join Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame on Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod
				inner join Billing.AccountBilling
				ON (Billing.Account.UniqueAccountSeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.UniqueAccountSeqId AND IsCurrentRecord = 'Y')
				AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision
				AND Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.UtilityCompanySeqid
			where (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid = 7 )
				and ( Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AdjustedAccountBill is null )
				and ( Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y' )
			
			SELECT @AccountBillingElectric = @@rowcount
			print 'Number of Account billing electric inserts: ' + cast(@AccountBillingElectric as varchar(10))
			
			if (@AccountBilling <> @AccountBillingElectric)
			begin
				set @CommitTransaction = 'N'
				raiserror ('Account billing Rebills (%7d) does not match the Account billing Eelctric Rebills (%7d)', --
						   16, -- Severity.
						   1, -- State.
						   @AccountBilling,
						   @AccountBillingElectric
				) with log;
			end
			
			update Billing.AccountBillingElectric
			set AdjustedAccountElectric = Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid, 
				AuthenticatedUserID = @AuthenticatedUserID,
				LastUpdate =getdate()
			FROM 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric inner join
				Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame on Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod inner join
				Billing.AccountBillingElectric  
				ON (Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.UniqueAccountSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.UniqueAccountSeqId ) AND  -- added on 2019-02-21 zd
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.BillingPeriodRevision and 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.UtilityCompanySeqid
			WHERE 
				(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid = 7) and 
				(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AdjustedAccountBill is null) 
				and (Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')                      		

			SELECT @AccountBillingElectricUpdate = @@rowcount
			print 'Number of Account billing electric Updated: ' + cast(@AccountBillingElectricUpdate as varchar(10))
			
			update Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric
			set  
				ProcessedInTheCurrentPeriod ='Y',
				AdjustedAccount = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountSeqid, 
				AdjustedAccountBill = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid, 
				AdjustedAccountBillElectric = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.AccountBillingElectricSeqid,
				LastUpdate = getdate(),
				AuthenticatedUserID = 1 --@AuthenticatedUserID
			FROM 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric inner join
				Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame on Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.BillingPeriod = Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.BillingPeriod inner join
				Billing.AccountBillingElectric on 
				Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.AdjustedAccountElectric and 
				(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.UniqueAccountSeqid = Billing.AccountBillingElectric.UniqueAccountSeqId )   -- added on 2019-02-21 zd
				INNER join
				Billing.AccountBilling on Billing.AccountBillingElectric.MonthlyAccountBillingChargesElectric = Billing.AccountBilling.AccountBillingSeqid and 
				(Billing.AccountBillingElectric.UniqueAccountSeqid = Billing.AccountBilling.UniqueAccountSeqId )   -- added on 2019-02-21 zd
				AND Billing.AccountBillingElectric.BillingPeriodRevision = Billing.AccountBilling.BillingPeriodRevision
			WHERE 
				(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AccountUtilityCompanySeqid = 7) and 
				(Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric.AdjustedAccountBill is null) and 
				(Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame.CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y')

			SELECT @AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric = @@rowcount
			print 'Number of Account billing adjustment electric updates: ' + cast(@AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric as varchar(10))
			
			if (@AccountBilling <> @AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric)
			begin
				set @CommitTransaction = 'N'
				raiserror ('Account billing Rebills (%7d) and the Account billing Eelctric Rebills (%7d) match by Account Billing Adjustment Electric (%7d) does not match', --
						   16, -- Severity.
						   1, -- State.
						   @AccountBilling,
						   @AccountBillingElectric,
						   @AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric
						   ) with log;
			end
			
			PRINT '@CommitTransaction = '+@CommitTransaction
		end try
		begin catch
			SELECT 
				@ExchangeErrorMessage ='Error in StoredProcedure %125s at line number %8.0d ',
				@ErrorMessage = error_message(),
				@ErrorSeverity = error_severity(),
				@ErrorState = error_state(),
				@ErrorNumber = error_number(),
				@ErrorProcedure = error_procedure(),
				@ErrorLine = error_line()		
				
			set	@ErrorMessage = @ExchangeErrorMessage + @ErrorMessage
				
			raiserror (@ErrorMessage, -- Message text.
						@ErrorSeverity, -- Severity.
						@ErrorState, -- State.
						@ErrorProcedure,
						@ErrorLine
						) with log;

			set @CommitTransaction = 'N'
			rollback transaction ProcessAccountBillingOriginals;
		end catch;
	END;
END;
